title: FPS Drop?
body: Before the recent client update I was sitting on a nice 180 fps on the highest settings, after the client downloaded I struggled to get above 110. Even at 110 it feels choppy, and resembles more of a 40 fps. I work other games like FO4 and the new skyrim just fine but this game feels choppy after the new client. Need to fix ASAP.

replies.body:
Did you install any windows or driver updates? One of those may have caused the change in your FPS. Additionally, it could be a simple power setting or something a quick repair could fix. I'd strongly recommend working through these sorts of steps that are covered in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).

Let me know if this helped.

Try disabling G-SYNC if you have it, or in the video settings click those two buttons at the bottom, the wait for vsync or refresh options. I hope this helps.

You could also run in Win 8 compatibility mode. Right click your icon, troubleshoot compatibility and then follow the steps.
